section.name: Preferences
section.p: Here are preferences to customize Tweial. You change preferences by editing the [TWEIAL_HOME]/conf/preferences.properties file.
section.source: # # Tweial will send an email only if the number of new tweets it finds is # GREATER THAN the value of this preferences. The default value, 0, means # Tweial will always send an email no matter how many new tweets it finds. # sendOnlyIfTweetsGreaterThan=0
